1.0.name: wordpress/bumpin-facebook-like-button
1.0.description: The Facebook like application allows visitors to “like” your page at just a click of the button, it also displays the number of “likes” your page has on Facebook. Every post on your blog will have it's own like button and count. When a visitor likes your post through facebook like button, it appears on her wall and helps spreading the word about your website on facebook.
